statements: UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_type = 'Login' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_source = 'Web' WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_source = 'External' WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_id = 1001;
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_description = 'Unauthorized access attempted' WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE SecurityBreaches SET location='Office A' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE FalseAlarms SET alarm_type='Fire Alarm' WHERE location='Building B';
UPDATE SecurityBreaches SET breach_type = 'Data Breach' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FalseAlarms SET alarm_type = 'Fire Alarm' WHERE location = 'Building A';
UPDATE SecurityBreachEvents SET breach_type='Data Leakage' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE FalseAlarms SET alarm_type='Fire Alarm' WHERE alarm_id=2;
UPDATE SecurityBreachEvents SET breach_type = 'Data Breach', description = 'Sensitive data leaked' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE FalseAlarms SET alarm_details = 'False alarm triggered due to system glitch', alarm_type = 'System Error' WHERE alarm_id = 3;
UPDATE SecurityBreachData SET location='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE AlarmHistory SET status='resolved', details='Resolved the issue' WHERE id=5;
UPDATE SecurityBreachData SET description = 'Improved security measures implemented' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE AlarmHistory SET status = 'Resolved', details = 'False alarm triggered by system glitch' WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE security_breaches SET severity = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE false_alarms SET reason = 'Testing' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE security_breaches SET severity = 5, date = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE false_alarms SET reason = 'Test Reason', date = '2022-02-20', location = 'New Location' WHERE id = 456;
